entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pinawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 08 January 2023
